descriptionProject: Get organised! Add your day's activities hour by hour, save them, and keep track of the day with color-coding.
Randomly generates a password from 8 to 128 characters long. You can choose the type of characters to include.
Discover the current weather details plus the 5-day forecast for any city you search. Your search will be saved and recalled when you return to the page.

A web-based burger logger. Created with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!). Follows MVC design pattern; uses Node and MySQL to query and route data in the app and Handlebars to generate the HTML.

An easy web-based way to track and reach fitness goals faster. Utilizes npm packages including chart.js, fitness-health-calculator, dotenv and passport and is deployed on Heroku with JawsDB. Follows MVC design pattern; uses Sequelize as an ORM to query and route data in the app and Handlebars to generate the HTML.
Feeling Hangry? Search for the ideal recipe to satisfy your food desire! Feeling Hangry? Search for the ideal recipe to satisfy your food desire!
